This site contains R code, data, and output from running code in support of:

Larkin, D., Buck, R., Fieberg, J. and S. Galatowitsch.
Revisiting the benefits of active approaches for restoring damaged ecosystems. *Submited to Proceedings of  the Royal Society B*.
 
You can download all files via the link below:

[Data and Code](./ProcB paper.zip)

We also provide the output from running all of the code on a separate tab.
